description: KubeCloudSharedConfiguration contains elements shared by both kube-controller manager and cloud-controller manager, but not genericconfig.

AllocateNodeCIDRs.description: AllocateNodeCIDRs enables CIDRs for Pods to be allocated and, if ConfigureCloudRoutes is true, to be set on the cloud provider.

CIDRAllocatorType.description: CIDRAllocatorType determines what kind of pod CIDR allocator will be used.

CloudProvider.description: CloudProviderConfiguration holds configuration for CloudProvider related features.

ClusterCIDR.description: clusterCIDR is CIDR Range for Pods in cluster.

ClusterName.description: clusterName is the instance prefix for the cluster.

ConfigureCloudRoutes.description: configureCloudRoutes enables CIDRs allocated with allocateNodeCIDRs to be configured on the cloud provider.

ExternalCloudVolumePlugin.description: externalCloudVolumePlugin specifies the plugin to use when cloudProvider is "external". It is currently used by the in repo cloud providers to handle node and volume control in the KCM.

NodeMonitorPeriod.description: nodeMonitorPeriod is the period for syncing NodeStatus in NodeController.

NodeSyncPeriod.description: nodeSyncPeriod is the period for syncing nodes from cloudprovider. Longer periods will result in fewer calls to cloud provider, but may delay addition of new nodes to cluster.

RouteReconciliationPeriod.description: routeReconciliationPeriod is the period for reconciling routes created for Nodes by cloud provider..

UseServiceAccountCredentials.description: useServiceAccountCredentials indicates whether controllers should be run with individual service account credentials.
